teacher_info.intro:

My interests are learning foreign languages music, literature, sport, art, design, travelling, photography, cooking and journalism. 

Don't hesitate to contact me! Choose a trial lesson! Let's get to know each other!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian A1-C1 | Комплексные уроки русского А1-С1
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are for:
- beginners who wants to start speaking as soon as possible;
- learners who already know some Russian and wants to improve their knowledge;
- advanced learners who wants to bring the language to perfection, analyze the language, learn slang and idioms, expand knowledge about the culture and history of Russia.

Эти уроки подходят:
- начинающим, кто хочет быстрее заговорить на русском языке
- продолжающим, кто уже учил русский язык и не хочет останавливаться
- продвинутым ученикам, стремящимся к идеалу; тем, кто любит анализировать язык; изучающим сленг, историю или культуру России.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice | Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's discuss different topics in Russian! 
(I advise you to have a minimum level of A2).

I will guide the conversation by asking discussion questions. In addition to the fact that you will express your opinion, we will learn to build questions, to find out the opinion of the interlocutor. In the process, I'll correct your mistakes.

In addition to the conversation, I suggest watching and discussing a video on the topic.

You can choose a theme from the list below. 
If you have any specific subject you would like to discuss with me, please, inform me before the class and I'll prepare a vocabulary especially for you.

For my part, I suggest the following topics for discussion:
- Capital and province. Advantages and disadvantages.
- An animal is a friend of people.
- Homeland and pedigree.
- Friendship with foreigners.
- Feast traditions in different countries.
- Traditional and unusual food.
- Consumption philosophy.
- Technics and modern gadgets.
- Cigarette - freedom or addiction?
- Jealousy and envy.
- What's worse: communication or loneliness?
- Love in art and life
- Roles of men and women, feminism
- Do I need to learn something from other nationalities?
- Appearance = soul?
- Is beauty a gift or a punishment?
- The benefits and harms of fashion.
- Sport is a new religion.
- Official and traditional medicine - which is better?
- Doctor-patient relationship
- Education and profession
- Time flies
- Life and death
- Nature protection and ecology ...

...and many other topics. Let's speak!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Business | Русский для бизнеса
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have an own business or business partners in Russia and want to make everything easier - welcome to this Business Course (А2-В2 levels).

The difference between this course and the general or communication course that I offer is mainly in the materials we use - vocabulary and practice are related to business communication. Even while studying grammar, we can stay in the business area.

For more effective work, let me know in advance in which business area you work and in what communication situations you need Russian. Feel free to contact me.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar or vocabulary tutoring | Грамматика или лексика по запросу
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you ever had a situation where you learn a language on your own, but cannot find the answer to your question? For example, what is the difference between the words "другой" and "разный" or "-то" and "-нибудь"? 
Or there is a particularly difficult grammatical topic for you that you cannot understand. 

In such cases, you can contact me and I will create for you an individual explanation of the material with examples and practice. 

!!!
Please note that for effective work you need to tell me the topic that interests you BEFORE THE LESSON BEGINS.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для детей-билингвов (4-10 лет)
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки русского языка для детей-билингвов и тех, для кого русский язык является иностранным.
Внимание!!! Уроки не подходят для детей, живущих в России и учащихся в российских садах и школах. 

Предлагаю отдельные программы для каждых возрастов. 
С детьми 4-6 лет изучаем печатные буквы, учимся читать и писать по-русски, развиваем устную речь, увеличиваем словарный запас. 
С детьми 7-10 лет изучаем печатные и/или прописные буквы, учимся читать рукописные тексты, писать прописью, изучаем грамматический строй речи (на функциональной основе), учимся говорить правильно, без ошибок, изучаем слова, развиваем образное мышление, читаем рассказы и учимся понимать содержание текстов. 

Рекомендуемая длительность уроков - 30, максимум 45 минут.

pro_course_detail.title: Group lessons A1-В2 | Групповые уроки А1-B2
pro_course_detail.description:
Group lessons have some advantages over personal lessons: new acquaintances, group assignments and greater variability than in an individual lesson, the ability to communicate in Russian with different people, low price, collegiate support etc. 

Group lessons are held strictly according to the schedule in Zoom. All materials are provided. 
Send me a private message for pre-registration or if you want more information.

Group A1.0 - Tuesday, Thursday at 19:00 Moscow time.
Group A1.1 - Monday, Thursday at 18:00 Moscow time.
Groups A2, B1, B2 in the set.

Man muss auch nicht vergessen, drei andere Aspekte der Sprache zu trainieren: Hören, Lesen und Schreiben.
Do not forget that only by training all aspects of the language can you see the result, so you and I can also do exercises that will help you master the material.

Ich finde es wichtig, Spaß beim Lernen zu bekommen. Ich hoffe, dass du unsere Stunde nett finden würdest. 
It is very important that the learning process is enjoyable. I hope that our classes will always cheer you up!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика  /  Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description:
What topics do you like to talk about? We can discuss literature, film, sports, culture of your country, etc. During the conversation I always write new words in the chat, explain the grammar, give idioms, proverbs and, of course, correct mistakes. We can also work with pictures, situational cases, problematic questions. It develops your language very well and increases the vocabulary.I use many different methods for your learning. Believe me, you will not get bored in this lesson! 
На какие темы вам нравится говорить? Мы можем обсуждать литературу, кино, спорт, культуру вашей страны и пр. В ходе разговора я всегда пишу новые слова в чат, объясняю грамматику, даю идиомы, пословицы и, конечно, корректирую ошибки. Также мы можем поработать с картинками, ситуационными задачами, проблемными вопросами. Это очень хорошо развивает ваш язык и увеличивает словарный запас. Я использую много разным методов для вашего обучения. Поверьте, вам не будет скучно на этом уроке!

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для начинающих/Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you just started learning Russian? Most likely, you don't know where to start, how to read correctly, or you need a basic knowledge of grammar and basic vocabulary.  In my lessons you will gradually master this knowledge and begin to speak, read and write in Russian. I use textbooks, books for reading. I also have a lot of personally developed exercises and materials, which will be very useful for you. Many students started to learn Russian with me from the beginning and they did it! You can do it as well! 
Вы только начали изучать русский язык? Скорее всего, вы не знаете с чего начать, как научить читать правильно, или вам нужны базовые знания грамматики и базовый словарный запас.  На моих уроках вы постепенно овладеете этими знаниями и начнете говорить, читать и писать на русском. Я использую учебники, книги для чтения. Также у меня много лично разработанных упражнений и материалов, которые будут очень полезными для тебя! Многие ученики начинали учить русский со мной с нуля и у них получилось! У тебя тоже всё получится!

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для детей и подростков / Russian for children and teenagers
pro_course_detail.description:
Занятия для детей всегда проходят интересно и весело. Мы будем практиковать говорение, чтение, письмо и аудирование в зависимости от уровня и увлечений ребенка.
Classes for children are always interesting and fun. We will practice speaking, reading, writing and listening depending on a child's  level and hobbies.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian language
pro_course_detail.description:
If you already have an elementary level of Russian, are you ready to move on?  These lessons are just for you! I am preparing textbooks and interesting, useful material for your level. We will learn grammar, how to read, write and speak. I also pay a lot of attention to vocabulary development. 
Если у вас уже есть начальный  уровень русского языка, вы готовы идти дальше?  Эти уроки как раз для вас! Я готовлю учебники и интересный, полезный материал для вашего уровня. Мы будем разбирать грамматику, читать, писать и говорить. Я также уделяю много внимания на развитие словарного запаса.

pro_course_detail.title: Old students only
pro_course_detail.description: If you are my stable student (you have had more than 2 month of classes with me) you can book these classes with lower price.

teacher_info.intro: Hey! I’m a teacher of English and Russian languages. I have more than 8 years of teaching experience. I am also keen on dancing and travelling. I’ve been exploring Russia for the last two years and realized what a beautiful country I was born and live in.
teacher_info.about_me: Hey! I’m a teacher of English and Russian languages. I have more than 8 years of teaching experience. I am also keen on dancing and travelling. I’ve been exploring Russia for the last two years and realized what a beautiful country I was born and live in.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I started my career as a private tutor and then taught English to teenagers at a private language school while working on my master’s. I then realized that I’d love to teach Russian as a foreign language too so I signed up for a special course at my alma mater. Then I taught English and Russian at a university and I also have experience of teaching corporate clients. 
At the moment I’m working at a language training centre and as a private teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I tailor my lessons to your needs and I give knowledge not only about the language but also the culture. I teach my students to think in the language they’re studying.

I use various materials like videos, texts, songs, interactive online games etc. I also will be giving you some homework because learning a language is a pleasure that you need to experience every day :)

exp_info.description: Именно на этом месте работы я научилась работать с подростками и это был мой первый опыт преподавания в компании в принципе.
Это был мой первый опыт преподавания РКИ после получения сертификата. Меня пригласили преподавать в университете на летних курсах, где я смогла отработать на практике полученные знания.

edu_info.description: Теория и методика преподавания иностранных языков и культур

cert_info.description: Этот сертификат подтверждает, что я владею методикой преподавания РКИ.
Для получения этого сертификата потребовалась тщательная подготовка и совершенствование языка. Сертификат доказывает владение английским языком на уровне, близком к носителю.

course_info.trial_description: At a trial lesson we chat to figure out what your needs and expectations are, I also listen to you in order to better understand your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice in English
pro_course_detail.description:
Speaking practice. 
* Choose this course if you want to improve your speaking skills. We will discuss the topics you're interested in or anything you want :)

* Normally our discussion is based around an article or a video I send you before the lesson. 

* If you buy a package or plan on having more than one lesson with me, I will create a document on google disc where I'll be writing down new vocabulary from our lessons and also the errors you might make. Of course, you will have access to this document so that you can work on your mistakes and practise new phrases.

* If I understand that we need to brush up on a specific grammar topic, I may suggest working on it. Your suggestions are also very much welcome :)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
*This course is for you if you want to start learning Russian and have either no or very little experience with Russian. 

*It is a structured course where we are going to use a course book. You will get your personal links to the student's book and to the workbook. One is for work during the lessons and the other is for homework.

*We are going to learn Russian letters, develop all skills: speaking, reading, writing, listening.

*If you want to save some time and money, it's a good idea to familiarize yourself with the Russian alphabet before taking the course!! If you don't know where to do it, contact me and I'll help you with the resources.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description:
*We are going to focus on developing the skills you need. Normally I use a course book as a basis with extra materials when needed. 

*We also watch videos, listen to songs and play different games to make learning process more engaging and fun.

* If you buy a package or plan on having more than one lesson with me, I will create a document on google disc where I'll be writing down new vocabulary from our lessons and also the errors you might make. Of course, you will have access to this document so that you can work on your mistakes and practise new phrases.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
*This course is suitable for those who want to practise Russian with a native speaker. We wil discuss everyday news or any other subject :)

* Normally our discussion is based around an article or a video I send you before the lesson. 

* If you buy a package or plan on having more than one lesson with me, I will create a document on google disc where I'll be writing down new vocabulary from our lessons and also the errors you might make. Of course, you will have access to this document so that you can work on your mistakes and practise new phrases.

* If I understand that we need to brush up on a specific grammar topic, I may suggest working on it. Your suggestions are also very much welcome :)

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you need to communicate with your colleagues and partners at work?

In this course we are going to work on business skills like preparing for a job interview, negotiations, meetings, phone calls and presentations. We'll boost your vocabulary and increase confidence in speaking :)

* If you buy a package or plan on having more than one lesson with me, I will create a document on google disc where I'll be writing down new vocabulary from our lessons and also the errors you might make. Of course, you will have access to this document so that you can work on your mistakes and practise new phrases.

pro_course_detail.title: Beautiful Russian Pronunciation (Красивое русское произношение)
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to get rid of the accent? 

There will be no grammar or conversational practice in this course, we'll be focusing only on your pronunciation. I'll help you with the sounds, connected speech and intonation.

!! Note that I ask you to book this course at least a week before the lesson. 
Why? I will need you to record yourself speaking Russian and send this voice message to me so that I can analyze your speech. I will create a plan specifically designed to help you on your way to perfect Russian pronunciation taking into consideration your personal errors in pronunciation.

teacher_info.intro: Hi I am Sveta. I live in Moscow. I worked in a news agency with Spanish language for 11 years, but then I decided to dedicate myself to teaching languages. As foreign languages have always been my passion, being a permanent student helps me to undertand any diffuculty or frustration a student might have.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi I am Sveta. I live in Moscow. I worked in a news agency with Spanish language for 11 years, but then I decided to dedicate myself to teaching languages. As foreign languages have always been my passion, being a permanent student helps me to undertand any diffuculty or frustration a student might have.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I consider myself an attentive person and I always try to do the best to make my students feel comfortable at lessons. To learn a language for many people is a goal, but I also invite you to enjoy the process. The lesson hours are the time you dedicate to yourself, and let's make it great!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I prefer to use a textbook in communicative approach as main one, buy in some moments I would mix it with some textbooks which focus a bit more on grammar. But of course we will always be speaking, speaking and speaking the great and mighty Russian language!!! Also I can always recommend movies, videos, songs so that you could surround yourself with Russian. Anyway, we can always discuss your needs and goals, and the system will be flexible.  See you in my lesson, Russian is not difficult!I

course_info.trial_description: In this lesson we will learn each other and you will tell me about your goals. En esta clase vamos a conocernos y me podrás contar sobre tus objetivos.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description: Just a practice, we can discuss any topic you want. Don't be afraid and let's speak Russian! Simplemente una conversación, podemos hablar sobre cualquier tema de tu interés. ¡No tengas miedo y hablemos ruso! Давайте говорить по-русски!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson we will learn grammar and then practice it during conversatioon. En la clase estudiaremos gramática y la practicaremos durante conversación.

pro_course_detail.title: Испанский для русских
pro_course_detail.description: Если вам понравилось, как я говорю по-испански, то я с удовольствием помогу вам в изучении этого прекрасного языка!

teacher_info.intro:
Привет. Меня зовут Елизавета, мне 45 лет. Я с Украины, из Харькова. 
В моей стране сейчас война, Харьков ежедневно бомбят. Временно моя семья осталась без дома, а мы с мужем без работы. Я остаюсь с мужем в Украине и ищу новые способы заработка для существования моей семьи. У меня двое несовершеннолетних детей, трое родителей и собака. Поэтому, я на italki в качестве преподавателя. До этого я тут учила английский язык.
teacher_info.short_signature: Закажи у меня урок русского или украинского - помоги Украине!
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет. Меня зовут Елизавета, мне 45 лет. Я с Украины, из Харькова. 
В моей стране сейчас война, Харьков ежедневно бомбят. Временно моя семья осталась без дома, а мы с мужем без работы. Я остаюсь с мужем в Украине и ищу новые способы заработка для существования моей семьи. У меня двое несовершеннолетних детей, трое родителей и собака. Поэтому, я на italki в качестве преподавателя. До этого я тут учила английский язык.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я умею понятно объяснять сложные вещи. До войны я была очень веселым и жизнерадостным собеседником. Сейчас с этим сложнее, но я беру себя в руки и смогу помочь вам в изучении русского или украинского языка.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мы можем общаться с вами на следующие темы:
1. БИЗНЕС. Я хорошо разбираюсь в стратегическом планировании, бюджетировании, разработке KPI и других системах оценки труда персонала. Могу поделиться опытом, как мы развивали свой ютубе-канал.
2. ПОДРОСТКИ. У меня двое детей подростков дочь 15 лет (она учится в Чехии) и сын 14 лет.
3. ПУТЕШЕСТВИЯ: мы много путешествовали семьей до войны, были во Франции, Польше, Италии, Болгарии, Венгрии, Испании, Германии. 
4. Общие темы: еда, соц.сети и прочее. 
5. ВОЙНА в УКРАИНЕ: конечно мы можем поговорить и на эту тему. Я очевидец этих ужасных событий.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный разговорный урок по русскому или украинскому языку.
Trial conversational lesson in Russian or Ukrainian.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice in Russian from beginner to advanced level
pro_course_detail.description:
Разговорный урок русского языка от начального уровня до продвинутого уровня.
Conversational lesson of Russian language from beginner to advanced level.

pro_course_detail.title: The war in Ukraine: YOUR PERSONAL HELP to brave Ukrainians
pro_course_detail.description:
You can choose this lesson if you want to help Ukraine. This lesson costs more than usual. Half of the cost of the lesson goes to help Ukrainians in need, whom I know personally. We will conduct it in Ukrainian or Russian. So you can directly help the Ukrainians in this war. I remind you that you can always choose a regular Russian or Ukrainian conversational lesson for $ 10 in the schedule. Glory to Ukraine!


Вы можете выбрать этот урок, если хотите помочь Украине. Этот урок стоит дороже обычного. Мы проведем его на украинском или русском языке. Половина стоимости урока идет на помощь нуждающимся украинцам, которых я знаю лично. Так вы можете напрямую помочь украинцам в этой войне. Напоминаю, что вы всегда можете выбрать обычный урок русского или украинского разговорного за 10$ в расписании. Слава Украине!

pro_course_detail.title: We speak the charming Ukrainian language from the elementary level
pro_course_detail.description:
Розмовляємо чарівною українською мовою. Вчимо прості українські слова та фрази з початківцями. Читаємо вірші Шевченка, Лесі Українки, Сергія Жадана з продвинутими знавцямі. Обговорюємо питання культури та історії.

We speak a charming Ukrainian language. We learn simple Ukrainian words and phrases with beginners. We read poems by Shevchenko, Lesya Ukrainka, Serhiy Zhadan with advanced experts. We discuss issues of culture and history.

pro_course_detail.title: The war in Ukraine: YOUR PERSONAL HELP to brave Ukrainians
pro_course_detail.description:
You can choose this lesson if you want to help Ukraine. This lesson costs more than usual. Half of the cost of the lesson goes to help Ukrainians in need, whom I know personally. We will conduct it in Ukrainian or Russian. So you can directly help the Ukrainians in this war. I remind you that you can always choose a regular Russian or Ukrainian conversational lesson for $ 10 in the schedule. Glory to Ukraine!

Ви можете обрати цей урок, якщо маєте бажання допомогти Україні безпосередньо. Цей урок коштує дорожче, ніж звичайний розмовний урок. Але половина вартості цього урока буде направлена на допомогу знедолених українців, яких я знаю особисто. Таким чином Ви можете напряму допомогти українцям у цій війні. Нагадую, що ви завжди зможете обрати звичайний урок розмовного українського за 10$ у розкладі. Слава Україні!

teacher_info.intro: I'm a Ukrainian national, have been living in London for more than six years. I am mostly involved in the spheres of teaching and translating, though I have varied work experience, including maritime transportations, academic work and project management. My hobbies are cooking, hand crafts and languages (more like a passion, rather than a hobby). I love travelling and spending time at the beach. I adore art nouveau artistic style and enjoy helping animals.
teacher_info.short_signature: CELTA certified professional teacher and translator with over 10 years of experience
teacher_info.introduction: I am a professional English teacher. I have a university degree in English teaching, and both CPE and CELTA certificates. I have been working as a teacher since 2009, mostly with adults, rarely teenagers. I have been working for a language school named Odessa Language Study Centre, after having moved to London I continue working for them, teaching their students via Skype, as well as teaching my own students. I usually teach general English but I also have experience in teaching business English to professionals in the spheres of transportations, law, trade, distribution. I can help practicing Russian and/or Ukrainian, as I am a native speaker for those who require a freer speaking activity. I do not teach Slavonic languages professionally, as I am not qualified to do that, neither I posess any method of doing that. I can only speak, give advice and promt on your Russian and/or Ukrainian.
teacher_info.about_me: I'm a Ukrainian national, have been living in London for more than six years. I am mostly involved in the spheres of teaching and translating, though I have varied work experience, including maritime transportations, academic work and project management. My hobbies are cooking, hand crafts and languages (more like a passion, rather than a hobby). I love travelling and spending time at the beach. I adore art nouveau artistic style and enjoy helping animals.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have two dergrees - a PhD in economics and a degree in English language and literature. Combined, this makes me a great business English reacher, which I enjoy teaching the most. I would also like to highlight the following:
•	Over 9 years’ experience teaching English to adult learners.
•	Over 5 years’ experience of teaching economic disciplines, including academic teaching and individual sessions.
•	CELTA qualification (course accomplished at the International House London).
•      Extensive experience in test preparation, namely IELTS, FCE, CAE, CPE
•	Knowledge of other languages (fluent Russian and Ukrainian, high level of French, basic knowledge of Spanish, Italian, German and Polish).
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching style is relaxed and flexible, I try my best to adjust to students' needs. I love teaching online, as this is not only a convenient way to teach and study in the modern age, but as well offers a range of ways to interact with the student to improve his/her language skills. In my more than 4 years’ experience in online teaching, I've become profficient in using various supplementary tools including IDroo, Quizlet, Padlet, Off2Class and other specific language teaching tools.What makes me happy about teaching is when my students feel their progress!

pro_course_detail.title: One-to-one English language lessons
pro_course_detail.description: I am offering professional one-to-one English language tuition. My general English leaasons are based on traditional proggammes combined with the use of modern online tools like Quizlet, Padlet, Offtoclass and others.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian: informal converstioanl practice
pro_course_detail.description: I am offering informal conversational practice. We can discuss any topic you prefer. I will do my best to extend your vocabulary and improve its use.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian: conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description: I am offering informal conversational practice. We can discuss any topic you prefer. I will do my best to extend your vocabulary and improve its use.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English lessons
pro_course_detail.description: Having a PhD in economics and vast work experience in different spheres of business as well as in teaching Business English to professionals of different backgrounds enables me to offer high quality lessons

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! My name is Nataly and I live in St.Petersburg, Russia. I really like to teach and study languages, so I'll be happy to help you with improving your Russian. I love travelling and studying other cultures as well as meeting new people. I have a degrees in Law and Economics. I worked in The Ministry of Internal Affairs. Now I'm retired, so I have more time for tutoring the Russian language. At our lessons we can talk about different topics that are interesting for you!

Меня зовут Наталья, и я преподаватель русского языка. Мне интересно изучать разные культуры и языки, а еще я люблю путешествовать.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified Russian language teacher with more than 25 years of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! My name is Nataly and I live in St.Petersburg, Russia. I really like to teach and study languages, so I'll be happy to help you with improving your Russian. I love travelling and studying other cultures as well as meeting new people. I have a degrees in Law and Economics. I worked in The Ministry of Internal Affairs. Now I'm retired, so I have more time for tutoring the Russian language. At our lessons we can talk about different topics that are interesting for you!

Меня зовут Наталья, и я преподаватель русского языка. Мне интересно изучать разные культуры и языки, а еще я люблю путешествовать.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have studied languages and literatures at university and on my own. I lived in several countries, so I know differences in educational systems in different countries. I can speak Russian, Ukrainian, English, some Italian, German, and Kazakh. I have been tutoring students for more than 25 years. I am a patient teacher and love helping people.

Я преподаю русский язык уже много лет и буду рада помочь вам в изучении языка. Я использую различные методы, чтобы сделать обучение интересным и продуктивным.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
On the first lesson I usually ask you some question to see your level. And then we discuss what exactly you need to improve. In our class we can focus on whatever you need: grammar, vocabulary, speaking, writing or listening. I'll provide you with all the materials before the lesson. I can also check your homework. Just ask me what you need and I'll get it ready for the lesson. We can discuss different topics, watch videos or just have an interesting talk to improve your conversational skills.

На уроках мы будем использовать разные методы и работать над всеми навыками: речь, грамматика, аудирование, письмо и так далее. Мы можем говорить на любые темы, которые интересны именно вам!

course_info.trial_description: На первом уроке мы познакомимся с друг другом, я проверю ваш уровень знания языка, а также мы обсудим варианты наших последующих занятий.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation & Speaking Practice - Разговорная практика (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
The purpose of this lesson is to help you become fluent in your spoken Russian, improve your pronunciation and learn new vocabulary. We can talk about any topic and I can explain Russian phrases and idioms for you. We can read texts during lessons or have only conversational practise.

Основной акцент сделан на развитие разговорных навыков студентов. В занятие могут быть включены работа с текстом и новой лексикой. Этот урок поможет вам улучшить произношение, выучить новые слова, избавиться от акцента и улучшить речь.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Grammar - Грамматика русского языка (А0-С2)
pro_course_detail.description:
The main purpose of this lesson is to help you with your grammar, speaking, reading, writing and listening. You can choose one skill for practising or work on some of them. We will practise conversation and use new grammar as well. We can use your book or I can send you all the necessary materials according to your level and your needs. 

Основная цель урока - изучение грамматики. На занятиях мы будем использовать учебные материалы, практиковать использование грамматических конструкций и изучать грамматические темы. Также мы можем практиковать письмо, чтение, разговор, используя новую грамматику.

pro_course_detail.title: NEW! General Russian Course & ТРКИ (A0-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: General Course includes work with grammar, reading, speaking, writing, pronunciation, vocabulary. We will start with alphabet and reading rules if you don't know letters and then study basic grammar, cases and vocabulary. We will work with textbooks and other materials that I send to students. Also this course includes TРКИ preparation if you need to pass this exam.

teacher_info.intro: Здравствуйте, мои уважаемые студенты! Рада познакомиться с Вами! Меня зовут Наталия и я сертифицированный преподаватель Русского языка как иностранного. teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone and welcome to my profile!
My name is Vasila, I come from Montenegro, where I have been teaching English and 2 other foreign languages for the last 8 years.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone and welcome to my profile!
My name is Vasila, I come from Montenegro, where I have been teaching English and 2 other foreign languages for the last 8 years.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I will try to do my best to fit your needs according to lesson duration, frequency and your devotion to the task. At the end of a lesson, you are very likely to be given homework to make sure you absorbed all the teaching material. Revising is absolutely the most important when it comes to languages.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
When it comes to my teaching style, I speak slowly and intelligibly and this is the main reason I consider myself a good interlocutor, but a skilled and patient listener too. 
It is my pleasure to see my students asking for help whenever they need it.

course_info.trial_description:
Welcome to my trial lesson!

In this class, your knowledge will be assessed, and you will get a learning plan made just for you. Whatever needs improving -- be it grammar, vocabulary, or speech -- it can be fixed with patience and persistence and there is no obstacle we can't overcome.

On the other hand, if there is a concept you can't seem to grasp and you'd like it to be clarified in a trial lesson, please let me know in advance by dropping me a message.

I can't wait to get to know you and I'm sure we'll have lots of fun during your English learning journey!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
Solidify your knowledge and improve your verbal fluency by engaging in spontaneous, real time conversation!

These lessons are usually casual and informal. We can decide on a topic beforehand – or you can leave it up to me to pick an interesting subject for us to talk about. After the lesson ends, you will receive a document containing all the new words and phrases.

Also, expect homework -- but don't worry, it won't be that difficult! Students usually have to write a short essay, or complete an exercise. Homework is not daunting and is of great use to students!

pro_course_detail.title: English Vocabulary and Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: In case you need to freshen your theoretical knowledge, vocabulary and grammar lessons will be of great help. These classes are the gateway to effortless communication and expressive speech – and are often overlooked!

pro_course_detail.title: German Grammar, Reading and Writing
pro_course_detail.description: Ein ständiges Lernen wird dir helfen, dich auf Deutsch auszudrücken und die Sprache gut zu verstehen.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational German
pro_course_detail.description: Egal aus welchem Grund du die deutsche Sprache lernst, Sprechen ist eine der wichtigsten Phasen im Unterricht.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian- Общий русский
pro_course_detail.description:
-Самые нужные фразы в обычной жизни. 
-Как правильно вести разговор.
-Если хотите поработать над произношением и чтением.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Serbian- часови конверзације на српском
pro_course_detail.description:
С обзиром да ми је ово матерњи језик, радо ћу Вам понудити лекције овог типа. 
Вјерујем да ћете се на мојим часовима осјећати подржано и да ће разговор са мном бити мотивишућ и занимљив.

pro_course_detail.title: Serbian Grammar, Reading and Writing- часови граматике на српском
pro_course_detail.description: Ако постоје недоумице око било којих граматичких цјелина у српском језику, радо ћу Вам изаћи у сусрет и помоћи да савладате дата језичка правила.

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Anastasiia. I live in Ukraine and teach English, Russian, and Ukrainian online. I am a passionate language learner and now I'm learning my 4th language(Korean) because I believe that talking to a person in their own language is the best way to get to know them.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Anastasiia. I live in Ukraine and teach English, Russian, and Ukrainian online. I am a passionate language learner and now I'm learning my 4th language(Korean) because I believe that talking to a person in their own language is the best way to get to know them.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Not only am I a qualified English teacher but also I am a native Russian and Ukrainian speaker. I love these languages for their beauty and melody. I enjoy having lessons with people from all over the world and I really appreciate the opportunity to share my knowledge with others. My goal is to teach students how to speak confidently and not to be afraid of making mistakes. (Because even native speakers often make them :) )
teacher_info.teaching_style: I assign homework after every class (to write an essay, to watch and comment on a video, to record a student's own audio podcast, etc.). All my lessons are customized in order to meet my students' needs. If they travel a lot, we practice every possible situation that may happen to them abroad. If they need to get ready for the interview or test, we make up our own strategies and pay attention to the most challenging parts. If they want to improve their overall understanding, we focus on real-life vocabulary and grammar.

course_info.trial_description: During trial lesson, we'll get a chance to get to know each other, discuss your learning goals, and have a small talk

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Ukrainian
pro_course_detail.description:
На уроках розмовної української ми будемо складати речення, які вам знадобляться в реальному житті; покращимо вашу вимову, побудуємо словниковий запас і вивчимо основні правила відмінювання дієслів та іменників. При цьому, це все буде відбуватися через обговорення різноманітних тем і питань
****
We'll make up sentences in Ukrainian, improve your pronunciation, build up essential vocabulary and learn conjugation rules through conversation.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
На занятиях мы будем обсуждать различные темы, которые вам интересны, будем описывать картинки и записывать свои собственные аудиоподкасты. Так же я буду отправлять вам домашнее задание, чтобы у вас была возможность лучше запомнить пройденный материал.
****
We'll practice conversations in Russian, describe pictures, discuss various topics(from Art and Music to Psychology) and make our own podcasts. Also, you will get assignments.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: We will do lots of grammar exercises, watch videos, read and analyze texts during our classes. While reading we won't be translating but explaining unknown words instead. It will help you to build up the vocabulary and get used to making sentences faster.

pro_course_detail.title: General(Reading,Listening,Pronunciation) Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс для тех людей, кто хочет улучшить общее понимание текстов и речи. Мы будем читать текст или смотреть видео на русском а потом его обсуждать, чтобы: 1) убедиться, что все было понятно; 2) попрактиковать говорение; 3) повторить новые слова и грамматические конструкции. 
***
This course is for those people who want to improve their overall text and speech understanding. We will read texts and watch videos(movies) in Russian. After that we'll discuss the material to: 1) make sure that everything's clear; 2) practice speaking skills; 3) go over new words and grammar patterns.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids
pro_course_detail.description: We'll be learning English through flashcards (animals, vegetables, parts of the body, colors, etc.), games, cartoons, and songs. There will be LOTS of repetitions so that a child can memorize and practice words and sentences faster and easier.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello. Thank you for reading my teacher profile!
My name is Natalia. I'm from Russia. Russian is my native language. I'm also fluent in English. I have experience living in Europe and China. I love languages both teaching and learning them.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello. Thank you for reading my teacher profile!
My name is Natalia. I'm from Russia. Russian is my native language. I'm also fluent in English. I have experience living in Europe and China. I love languages both teaching and learning them.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
- If you are a foreigner and are learning Russian, I'm here to help you. I've been teaching Russian for 4 years. Don't worry if you're a beginner or an advanced student, I'll create a lesson plan that fits your needs.

- If you are looking for an English teacher for your child, I'd love to be that teacher. I've been teaching English to children for 3 years now. I've lived in China and worked with Chinese children. I love it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
- In my Russian lessons I like using general words, phrases and other things that you use on a daily basis. This is a great way to start. 

- In my English lessons I'll use flash cards, books, and activity sheets and most importantly, I'll try and make each class fun and enjoyable for the child.

I look forward to meeting you or your child in my class.
Have a nice day!

course_info.trial_description:
You have nothing to lose, just try a 30-minute trial lesson with me and see if you like it or not. You can ask me any question you want.

And don't forget that language is a skill that gives you many benefits. See you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're a beginner in learning Russian, I'll be happy to teach you. If you already speak a little Russian, that's great too, we'll improve it quickly.

In my lessons I give you a sentence, then ask a question, you can repeat and practice your Russian in an easy way. 

My approach is to teach you as a child, so you'll have fun and you won't be afraid of Russian. Hope to see you soon in a class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's communicate in Russian. I'm here for you. Don't worry, I'll help you speak in class. I usually tell short stories to help you improve your listening comprehension. And I ask a lot of questions.

Only practice, practice and practice will make your Russian better!
Pick a day and time, and the first step is taken. See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: English Lessons for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: I would welcome the opportunity to help you with English. I've been teaching and improving English for more than 4 years. I've also worked in China as an English teacher.

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Катя. Родилась на юге России, в настоящее время живу в Москве. Работаю администратором в школе фламенко. В свободное время люблю сходить в кино, на концерт  или в клуб с друзьями. I can't live without music and dancing. Salsa, son cubano, tango, flamenco are my life. Also i like cinema - author's (Allen, Lynch, Jarmusch, Tarkovsky.  I am open-minded and unprejudiced person.
Hablo en castellano y lo sigo mejorando. Me enamoré de esa lengua  cuando tenia clases de tango con maestros de Argentina. Y esto cambió mi vida. Ya no puedo imaginarme sin mis amigos  hispanohablantes y sin las canciones  de Buena Vista)
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Катя. Родилась на юге России, в настоящее время живу в Москве. Работаю администратором в школе фламенко. В свободное время люблю сходить в кино, на концерт  или в клуб с друзьями. I can't live without music and dancing. Salsa, son cubano, tango, flamenco are my life. Also i like cinema - author's (Allen, Lynch, Jarmusch, Tarkovsky.  I am open-minded and unprejudiced person.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я очень люблю родной русский язык. У меня есть только опыт помощи  с русским языком моим друзьям. Но я работала тьютором в сети кофеен в Москве - и могу сказать , что была как наставник   лояльна и очень терпелива, но требовательна.
I do not have a big experience of teaching Russian, but I have worked as a tutor in a chain of coffee shops for a long time and I also have many foreign friends whom I help with Russian. As a tutor I am patient but demanding.
Como tutor de ruso solo tengo experiencia  con m,is amigos. Pero mucho tiempo trabaje como tutor en una cadena de  cafeterias. Tengo paciencia, empatía y percepción.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мой стиль преподавания  пока не сложился. Но я руководствуюсь  опытом ведущих преподавателей русского как иностранного и использую современные учебники и методы.
I continue to work on creating my style. For me, the main thing is that learning a language will be interesting and  not boring. 
Todavia sigo buscando mi propio estilo. Pero para mi lo más importante es que nuestra comunicación sea viva y no aburrida.

course_info.trial_description:
Всем привет! Друзья! Приглашаю на пробный урок по русскому языку.  Для меня это прежде всего знакомство с вами просто как с новым человеком, даже не в контексте знаний по русскому языку. Важно  почувствовать  общую энергетику, атмосферу,  и просто заглянуть друг другу в глаза.  Что-то типа пилотной серии) До встречи!
Hola a todos! Os quiero invitar al clase de prueba de ruso.  Para conocernos en personas  y para sentir el ambiente común. Nos vemos!
Hello friends! I invite you to a pilot - lesson! See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
Как и в случае с любым другим языком, русский невозможен без базовой грамматики. Необходимая основа - это  алфавит, чтение по слогам и далее к простым разговорным  фразам. Мне приятно будет стать  вашим проводником в мир русской культуры. Кто знает, может быть вы более тонко осмыслите фильмы Тарковского, зная его родной язык и русский менталитет)
Quién no ha deseado en su vida leer Dostoevskyi o Dovlatov en original? Es posible! Pero ...hay que empezar con el alfabeto)
As Confucius said "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.  Russian is difficult. But we will start from alphabet and phrases for traveling to Russia. Step by step all is possible!

teacher_info.intro:
I am Mila from Kazakhstan and I love learning languages. I can speak Russian, English, Chinese and a little Turkish. I lived abroad for 4 years and made friends from all over the world. I enjoy exploring different cultures and communicating with people of different nationalities. My friends would always get amazed by the fact that I could speak Russian and ask me to teach them a couple of phrases. I realized that many people were interested in learning this language and this thought brought me to italki. 
Some random facts about me: I love coffee, pets, reading, ice skating, traveling, making candles, yoga.
teacher_info.short_signature: 大家好！I am a friendly native Russian speaker with a degree in pedagogy who loves coffee and pets:)
teacher_info.about_me:
I am Mila from Kazakhstan and I love learning languages. I can speak Russian, English, Chinese and a little Turkish. I lived abroad for 4 years and made friends from all over the world. I enjoy exploring different cultures and communicating with people of different nationalities. My friends would always get amazed by the fact that I could speak Russian and ask me to teach them a couple of phrases. I realized that many people were interested in learning this language and this thought brought me to italki. 
Some random facts about me: I love coffee, pets, reading, ice skating, traveling, making candles, yoga.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
It is easy for me to get along with my students and make sure they feel comfortable and see their progress from the very first lesson. I have almost 5 years of experience in teaching English abroad. I worked with different age groups from 3-year-olds to adults and levels from total beginners to more advanced students, offline and online. I have a TESOL certificate in teaching English. During my study in China I had an intership and taught Mandarin Chinese to international students from all over the world. In 2020 I got a degree in pedagogy.
Now I also have some experience teaching Russian on iTalki! All of my students enjoy the classes and are on their way to speak Russian fluently :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like to keep things simple. Conversational practice lessons will be tailored for you according to your needs and interests. For the general Russian lessons I will provide you with PDF textbooks which you can refer to after the class. 
I encourage my students to use everything they learn right away. And I am happy to answer any questions related to the language and our classes. 
It is preffered that the student prepares a short introduction about him/herself before our first class and states his or her goals and expectations for the learning process. 
I usually give my students homework but it is not compulsary.

course_info.trial_description:
Hi! This is a trial lesson where we can get to know each other and set goals for your learning process! 
Привет! Это пробный урок, на котором мы познакомимся и определимся с целями учебного процесса!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я преподаю только на русском языке, в процессе уроков уделяем внимание правильному (естественному) построению речи, корректному использованию грамматики. Учимся свободной и интересной разговорной лексике, исправляем ваше произношение
Разбираем внимательно трудные и непонятные студентам вопросы языка в легкой и дружеской атмосфере.
I teach only in Russian, during the lessons we will pay attention to the correct (natural) construction of speech, the correct use of grammar. Learn free and interesting conversational vocabulary, correct your pronunciation.
We analyze carefully difficult and incomprehensible language issues for students in an easy and friendly atmosphere.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
* I USE GOOGLE DOCUMENTS FOR CORRECTIONS*
На уроках мы будем говорить только на русском языке, потому что главное в изучении иностранного языка - это полное погружение в языковую среду и практика!
Мои занятия подходят для людей, которые уже знают основы русского языка
1.Разговорный русский язык. Основная цель - улучшить произношение, разговорный уровень и пополнить словарный запас. Обсуждаем любые интересующие Вас темы. 
2.Общий русский язык. Основная цель - структурированное и последовательное изучение грамматики языка с обучающими материалами, правильное построение разговорной речи, чтение.
 Помощь в подготовке презентаций, отчетов или других рабочих документов на русском (деловом языке)

course_info.trial_description:
In the lesson we get to know each other. It might be general conversation or discussion of interesting topic for you (it depend on your level). During the conversation I determine your level, then i'll offer studying materials for you level.
Contact me before the lesson. Please include your current level of Russian and why you are interested in taking lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice/Russian pronunciation,Reading
pro_course_detail.description:
1. Russian conversational practice, for students who want to practice conversational Russian. The main goal - to improve your speaking skill, pronunciation, as well as improve your spoken grammar and expand your range of vocabulary.
2. Russian pronunciation/Reading, for students who want to practice pronunciation&reading. In this lesson you will have the opportunity to learn how to pronounce like a native Russian speaker. You will read an exciting story suited to your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Traditional Russian Lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Traditional lessons focus on grammar, vocabulary, and other concepts. The lessons for students who already know the basics of the language. I offer studying materials tailored to your level. Each lesson is structured, learning new grammar, doing different exercises, and taking time to practice speaking. Homework will be assigned after these lessons.
  
Typical Russian Lesson plan  for 60 minutes (but will change depending on the student):
10 minutes - Warm Up
15 minutes - Teach new grammar/vocabulary/concept
20 minutes - Practice new grammar/vocabulary/concept
15 minutes - Fluency practice/error correction

teacher_info.intro: Originally from Kiev, Ukraine, I have lived in three foreign countries: for seven years in Russia (Moscow), for three years in France (Marseille, Aix-en-Provence, Paris) and at the moment I've been living for five years in Germany (Bonn, Dortmund, Karlsruhe). Currently working full-time as a Business IT Consultant, I have exposure to the multicultural environment dealing with all the five languages that I speak every day. In my free time I go jogging, do yoga, cook, paint and learn playing the piano. I also travel a lot. As an open-minded and social person, I’m happy to meet new interesting people.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi! My name is Yuliia and I’m from Ukraine. Currently living and studying in France, I discover my ability to help people to learn languages. I’m totally bilingual as Ukrainian and Russian native-speaker. My English and French are on the C-level. Don’t be scared, if you are a beginner at Russian or Ukrainian, I’ll explain you even the alphabet. I will prepare some materials individually if it is necessary for you. I can also propose my help for beginners in English and French. Do not hesitate to contact me and write exactly what you are waiting for our talk. I hope to see you soon.

Привет. Меня зовут Юля. Я из Украины, в данный момент живу и учусь во Франции. Мои родные языки – русский и украинский, я также свободно говорю по-английски и по-французски. Во время учебы и общения с людьми из разных стран, я открыла в себе способность помогать в изучении иностранных языков. Я хочу Вам помочь в изучении французского и английского языков для начального уровня. Пишите. Мы выберем лучшую форму обучения именно для Вас!

Bonjour à toutes et à tous! Je m’appelle Yuliia. Je suis d’Ukraine, j’habite actuellement en France. Mes langues maternelles sont le russe et l’ukrainien, aussi je parle le français et l’anglais au niveau élevé. Je vous propose mon assistance de langues pour apprendre le russe et l’ukrainien du n’importe quel niveau. Pendant les cours je vais vous expliquer la prononciation, la grammaire, les spécialités d’orthographe, même l’alphabet. N'hésitez pas me contacter, écrivez-moi ce qu’on attend de notre conversation.
teacher_info.about_me: Originally from Kiev, Ukraine, I have lived in three foreign countries: for seven years in Russia (Moscow), for three years in France (Marseille, Aix-en-Provence, Paris) and at the moment I've been living for five years in Germany (Bonn, Dortmund, Karlsruhe). Currently working full-time as a Business IT Consultant, I have exposure to the multicultural environment dealing with all the five languages that I speak every day. In my free time I go jogging, do yoga, cook, paint and learn playing the piano. I also travel a lot. As an open-minded and social person, I’m happy to meet new interesting people.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Being always passionate about languages, I've been a language teacher on italki since 2015, having more than 100 students from all over the world. I completed a range of TEFL certificates (Teaching English as a Foreign Language, Teaching Business English, Teaching English to Young Learners) and Certificate in Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language to become a professional English and Russian teacher in 2019-2020. My aim is to continue obtaining professional certifications in teaching other languages. I teach English, French, Russian and Ukrainian for any purposes depending on the student’s needs.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Depending on your needs, we could cover other language skills apart from speaking such as listening, reading and writing. The main idea of an efficient lesson is the student’s motivation and interest in learning that I always encourage. During the lessons I use Google Docs where I write all the comments, corrections, put additional information, links, etc. That’s how everything we are working on is captured and the progress can be tracked. Every lesson is individual, that’s why I use a great variety of materials depending on the student’s approach. For example, we can sing songs or just talk, watch and then discuss videos or focus on grammar and homework. It’s up to you.
